channel.title: CVE Feed for ThimPress -- LearnPress Export Import
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ThimPress -- LearnPress Export Import

item.title: CVE-2024-32588|2024-04-18T08:48:00.987Z -- ThimPress -- LearnPress Export Import
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in ThimPress LearnPress Export Import allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects LearnPress Export Import: from n/a through 4.0.3.

item.title: CVE-2024-31241|2024-04-07T18:00:12.191Z -- ThimPress -- LearnPress Export Import
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an SQL Command ('SQL Injection') vulnerability in ThimPress LearnPress Export Import.This issue affects LearnPress Export Import: from n/a through 4.0.3.
